statement.p: In 55.17 of the last 29 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{29}}={0.5517}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{29}. \displaystyle{P}={0.5517}\cdot{29}={15.9993}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 29-15.9993=13.0007 We round that as requested to 13.
